SELECT ha.ID, ha.APP_NAME, ha.PRIORITY, ha.IMAGE_PATH, ha.IMAGE_TYPE_PATH, ha.LINK, ha.TYPE_ID, ha.STATUS, ha.CREATE_USER_CODE, ha.CREATE_USER_NAME, ha.CREATE_TIME, ha.LAST_UPDATE_USER_CODE, ha.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, ha.LAST_UPDATE_TIME FROM HYJZ_APPLICATION ha INNER JOIN HYJZ_USER_GROUP_APPLICATION huga ON ha.ID = huga.APPLICATION_ID
WHERE ha.STATUS = '1' AND ha.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND huga.USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ha.PRIORITY ASC
